about_the_game:
Survive, Build, and Thrive in a World Full of Uncertainty

In Settlement Odyssey, a group of settlers must work together to carve out a life in an untamed land. There are no kings or rulers—just people trying to survive, build a home, and ensure future generations can thrive. But survival won’t be easy.

🏡 Build a Home, Shape a Future – Construct shelters, gather materials, and expand your settlement as your people adapt to the world around them.

🌿 Live Off the Land – Forage for food, hunt wildlife, and manage resources wisely. Seasons change, and settlers must prepare for what lies ahead.

⚔ Survival Comes at a Cost – The wilderness is not always welcoming. Predatory animals roam the land, and settlers must be ready to defend themselves or risk losing their lives.

👶 A Growing Community – Families form naturally over time, and as settlers have children, the next generation will carry on the legacy of survival and progress.

🛠 Work, Craft, and Improve – Every settler has a role, whether farming, hunting, crafting tools, or building structures. Over time, their skills will grow, making the settlement stronger.

🌎 A Living World – The land changes with the seasons. Harsh winters, bountiful summers, and unexpected events will shape the settlers’ fate.

There are no wars to fight, but the struggle for survival is real. Can your settlers endure the dangers of nature and build a lasting home?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 (6GB) / AMD Radeon RX 580 (8GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / Windows 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K / AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3060 Ti / AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: In Settlement Odyssey, guide a group of settlers as they build, survive, and grow in a harsh, untamed world. Gather resources, hunt for food, craft tools, and defend against wild animals. With no rulers or wars, the greatest challenge is survival itself. Can your settlers thrive?
